name: A story in the desert
description:
My submission for the Ludum Dare 46 Jam. Or at least what I managed to finish.

Use arrow keys to move.

Stuff I meant to implement but didn't get around to:

  • Metroidvania-style level progression to find new sources of water
  • A recurring antagonistic wolf
  • Combat and chase mechanics

Might still be added later, depending on feedback and interest.
